name: Aero Chimera
storyline: In somewhat distant future, globe has been mostly consumed by two warring super-corporations, VAV and DAEL. Their products range from very usual hygiene products to weapons of mass destruction. Recently however, DAEL made a daring attack at VAV, completely demolishing some of their factories and bases - now VAV has decided to act in retribution and launch a counter-attack with newly developed AERO CHIMERAs, which combine man and machine in twisted ways.
summary:
A vertical arcade shoot'em'up with excruciating difficulty level and easy scoring system.

Be annihilated in maelstorm of fire or persevere and destroy opposing DAEL-corporation!
